content:
I have an existing django site. How could I have zulip authenticate against it? Would I have to sync the users manually across dbs or is there a way for zulip to connect directly to the existing db?

(I searched a bit and didn't find anything)
@mustafa0x we don't have a specific Django integration but if your other Django site offers OpenID, SAML, or a similar standard protocol for authentication, one could use that to login to Zulip.
mustafa0x has marked this topic as resolved.
